DOC.brief_summary: Preference study: Genuair vs HandiHaler inhalers in COPD patients.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Preference, Satisfaction and Ease of Use of Inhalers in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Diagnosed Patients
DOC.criteria: Adult male or female patients aged ≥ 40 with stable COPD Naïve patients to the use of study inhalers Patients agreeing on participating and signing the Informed Consent Form Patients with other clinically significant disease, particularly body malformations or diseases affecting coordination and/or motor system Patients unable to read product package instructions and answer patient reported questionnaires
